paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the KCNH2 gene and its variants, specifically focusing on the R56Q mutation, but does not provide detailed penetrance data or individual patient information.

functional_data.summary: The hERG R56Q mutation accelerates deactivation kinetics and alters steady-state inactivation properties.

variants.additional_notes: The paper primarily focuses on the functional effects of the R56Q mutation in vitro.
key_quotes: One of the most profound mutations is an arginine to glutamine change at position 56 in the hERG eag domain.

extraction_metadata.notes: The paper discusses the KCNH2 gene and its variants but lacks detailed penetrance data or individual patient information.
